channel.title: A couple questions
channel.description:
Ok, i got a few questions, if you can anwser it will help me out alot!
I deleted 2 shops, cant remember how... so i need to know how to do that. I tried going to autospawn going to there id thing deleting everything, saved, then compiled. That didnt work.
How do i only delet one item in a shop. I went to autospawn.cfg, deleted the item code, compiled. That didnt work
If u click on food on my server it eats it right away. So u can eat five monkfish in one second pretty much. (i have wepion that i would like to be able to delete from a shop and change the stats)
Some monsters dont die.
How do i make an item really good that only i can use? That can hit HIGH like one hit any monster.
How do i add drops to monsters.
How do i change what shops sya.
If u help me out thanks! I got to go to bed so ill look at this in the moring. Thanks again everyone!

item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx

@xxlukexx wrote:

bringin up old old topics again??

Read full topic

item.title: A couple questions

item.description:
@austin47f wrote:

all ur shops r in shops.cfg

Read full topic

item.title: A couple questions
item.dc:creator: @baez9 baez9
item.description:
@baez9 wrote:

to make a Item hit very high, look for the item in item.cfg and next to it there will be numbers the first 3 are shop price, the last couple are the bonuses, change the bonuses to a high bonus like 10000 to make it hit high.

Read full topic
